con:testCase.name: GoodCase-MiPayServices-BalanceCheck-AfterRegistration
con:testCase.con:description:
https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3048
Followed test-scenario is implemented: - MSISDN registration for MiPay with Balance under 3.99,-EUR. - exec job: BALANCE_CHECK_AFTER_REGISTRATION - validate, that drc inform mipay about charge

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: 491191000398
Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: 491191000398
MiPay.reachedMVNOLowBalanceThreshold: Return response for request with msisdn ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
